default.message: Wishing you all the best on this incredible achievement!

helluva-play.message: You may say the same thing over and over, but I still love you.

elon-buys-the-jets.message:
Dear Jets Fan,
Losing sucks, but just remember it can always get worse!
Best.

rooting-for-the-birds.message: WARNING: rooting for the birds may cause high blood pressure, anxiety and palpitations.

no-pressure-drake.message:
Dear Pats Fan,
Good luck with the new job. I heard the last guy was pretty good.
Best.

michelle-ultra.message: Cheers to being exactly who you are.

cant-catch-caleb.message:
Dear Bears Fan,
I heard you had a bad day at work. Sometimes you give it your all and come up short. But you can still be great tomorrow.
Best.
